original_text: And since you are to regard them as unclean, you must not eat their meat; you must regard their carcasses as unclean.
korean_text: 이들은 너희에게 가증한 것이니 너희는 그 고기를 먹지 말고 그 주검을 가증히 여기라

sentences.original_text: And since you are to regard them as unclean
you must not eat their meat
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들의 고기를 먹어서는 안 되며

sentences.original_text: you must regard their carcasses as unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들의 사체를 부정하다고 여겨야 한다
